text: Txns are assigned timestamps based on when they arrive at the DBMS. Partitions are protected by a single lock: — Each txn is queued at the partitions it needs. — The txn acquires a partition’s lock if it has the lowest timestamp in that partition’s queue. — The txn starts when it has all of the locks f partitions that it will read/write. | kx VOLTDB SFAUNA r SE 14 » Pl @ 5640/1.2037 - HORIZONTAL PARTITIONING Partitions > 5 $ I O .
